nodes.text: H'ratth was a lush planet with a Jedi Academy where Jedi Master Chamma taught Andur Sunrider the Jedi ways in 4001 BBY. It was the homeworld of Vima Sunrider. The academy was known for its training of Jedi healers.

The Essential Atlas, a reference book published in 2009, placed the H'ratth system in the Colonies region of the galaxy. However, the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, published on the official Star Wars website after the release of the Atlas, located the system (and consequently the planet) in the Inner Rim. It was mentioned in The Jedi Path: A Manual for Students of the Force, where it was mentioned that Jedi healers were often trained on the planet.
